description.zh-cn: 中国会计学家，曾任中央财政金融学院教授，中国会计学会顾问。
description.en: Chinese accountant, former professor at the Central Institute of Finance and Banking, and advisor to the Accounting Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等教育机构，后发展为中央财经大学。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, which later developed into the Central University of Finance and Economics.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性会计学术团体。
description.en: A national academic accounting organization in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
